markdown:
![Heart Disease: Signs, Symptoms, and Complications](data:image/png;base64,)
Heart disease symptoms can vary, but common indicators include `chest pain or discomfort, shortness of breath, and fatigue`.Other symptoms may include pain or discomfort in the arms, jaw, back, neck, or stomach, as well as dizziness, lightheadedness, and swelling in the feet or ankles.[[1]](https://www.mountsinai.org/health-library/selfcare-instructions/warning-signs-and-symptoms-of-heart-disease)[[2]](https://www.health.harvard.edu/heart-health/5-overlooked-symptoms-that-may-signal-heart-trouble)[[3]](https://www.cdc.gov/heart-disease/about/men-and-heart-disease.html#:~:text=Symptoms,2)[[4]](https://www.mayoclinic.org/diseases-conditions/chest-pain/symptoms-causes/syc-20370838#:~:text=Chest%20pain%20symptoms%20due%20to%20a%20heart,teeth%20or%20upper%20belly.%20Shortness%20of%20breath.)[[5]](https://amandeephospital.org/blogs/common-signs-and-symptoms-of-heart-disease/#:~:text=Shortness%20of%20breath%20is%20a%20common%20symptom,discomfort%2C%20you%20should%20call%20an%20ambulance%20immediately.)

Elaboration:[[1]](https://www.heart.org/en/about-us/heart-attack-and-stroke-symptoms)

1. Chest Pain or Discomfort: This is a well-known symptom, but it can manifest differently for individuals.It may feel like pressure, squeezing, or a sharp pain in the chest, and can radiate to other areas like the arms, neck, jaw, or back.[[1]](https://www.mountsinai.org/health-library/selfcare-instructions/warning-signs-and-symptoms-of-heart-disease)[[2]](https://www.heart.org/en/about-us/heart-attack-and-stroke-symptoms)[[3]](https://www.mayoclinic.org/diseases-conditions/chest-pain/symptoms-causes/syc-20370838#:~:text=Chest%20pain%20symptoms%20due%20to%20a%20heart,teeth%20or%20upper%20belly.%20Shortness%20of%20breath.)[[4]](https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/heart-attack/)

2. Shortness of Breath: Difficulty breathing, especially during activities or while at rest, can be a sign of heart problems.[[1]](https://www.health.harvard.edu/heart-health/5-overlooked-symptoms-that-may-signal-heart-trouble)[[2]](https://www.heart.org/en/about-us/heart-attack-and-stroke-symptoms)

3. Fatigue: Persistent and unexplained fatigue, even with minimal exertion, can indicate heart issues.[[1]](https://www.health.harvard.edu/heart-health/5-overlooked-symptoms-that-may-signal-heart-trouble)[[2]](https://www.cdc.gov/heart-disease/about/men-and-heart-disease.html#:~:text=Symptoms,2)

4. Pain or Discomfort in Other Areas: Pain or discomfort in the arms, jaw, back, neck, or stomach can be associated with heart disease, particularly if it occurs alongside other symptoms.[[1]](https://www.bhf.org.uk/informationsupport/heart-matters-magazine/medical/signs-you-might-have-heart-disease)[[2]](https://www.heart.org/en/about-us/heart-attack-and-stroke-symptoms)

5. Dizziness or Lightheadedness: Feeling faint or lightheaded, especially when standing up, can be a warning sign.[[1]](https://www.cdc.gov/heart-disease/about/men-and-heart-disease.html#:~:text=Symptoms,2)[[2]](https://www.aurorahealthcare.org/services/heart-vascular/conditions/heart-disease/symptoms)

6. Swelling in the Legs, Ankles, or Feet: Fluid retention and swelling in the lower extremities can be a sign of heart failure.[[1]](https://www.health.harvard.edu/heart-health/5-overlooked-symptoms-that-may-signal-heart-trouble)[[2]](https://medlineplus.gov/ency/patientinstructions/000775.htm#:~:text=Swelling%20in%20the%20Legs%2C%20Ankles%2C%20or%20Feet&text=Swelling%20%28edema%29%20in%20your%20lower,or%20notice%20some%20weight%20gain.)

7. Palpitations: Feeling like the heart is racing, fluttering, or skipping beats can indicate an arrhythmia, a type of heart rhythm disorder.[[1]](https://www.cdc.gov/heart-disease/about/men-and-heart-disease.html#:~:text=Symptoms,2)[[2]](https://artemiscardiac.com/blog/early-signs-and-symptoms-of-heart-disease#:~:text=Heart%20Palpitations.%20If%20you%20feel%20your%20heart,feeling%20dizzy%20or%20uncomfortable%20in%20your%20chest.)

8. Other Potential Symptoms: Some individuals may experience nausea, vomiting, sweating, or a feeling of indigestion.[[1]](https://www.bhf.org.uk/informationsupport/heart-matters-magazine/medical/signs-you-might-have-heart-disease)[[2]](https://www.cdc.gov/heart-disease/about/men-and-heart-disease.html#:~:text=Symptoms,2)

Important Considerations:

- Symptoms can vary in intensity and presentation from person to person.[[1]](https://www.cdc.gov/heart-disease/about/men-and-heart-disease.html#:~:text=Symptoms,2)[[2]](https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/heart-attack/)
- Some heart conditions can be silent, with no noticeable symptoms until a serious event like a heart attack occurs.[[1]](https://www.cdc.gov/heart-disease/about/men-and-heart-disease.html#:~:text=Symptoms,2)
- If you experience any of these symptoms, especially chest pain or shortness of breath, seek immediate medical attention.[[1]](https://www.heart.org/en/about-us/heart-attack-and-stroke-symptoms)[[2]](https://amandeephospital.org/blogs/common-signs-and-symptoms-of-heart-disease/#:~:text=Shortness%20of%20breath%20is%20a%20common%20symptom,discomfort%2C%20you%20should%20call%20an%20ambulance%20immediately.)

items.text: Heart disease symptoms can vary, but common indicators include chest pain or discomfort, shortness of breath, and fatigue. Other symptoms may include pain or discomfort in the arms, jaw, back, neck, or stomach, as well as dizziness, lightheadedness, and swelling in the feet or ankles.

items.title: Important Considerations:
items.text: Symptoms can vary in intensity and presentation from person to person. Some heart conditions can be silent, with no noticeable symptoms until a serious event like a heart attack occurs. If you experience any of these symptoms, especially chest pain or shortness of breath, seek immediate medical attention.
